page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: Catterline has only one shop and it is situated next to the main road. It has petrol pumps and sells almost anything,from wellington boots to cough mixture. Most people buy their Sunday papers there. Down in the village we get a butcher's van which comes from Inverbervie. A lot of people use the butcher's van. Also we have a fish van which comes from Gourdon. A library van comes from Stonehaven and quite a few of the older people use this van. The village people are beginning to use the big supermarkets in Stonehaven and Aberdeen. Supermarkets are just very large shops which sell quite a lot of things. So you can see Catterline people have quite a few ways of getting their shopping.
